scripts.buildProd: tsc && tsc-alias && npm run copyCommon && npm run updateProdPackage
scripts.copyCommon: mkdir -p dist/common && cp -r ../common/dist dist/common/ && cp ../common/package.json dist/common/
scripts.devApi: tsc -p dev.tsconfig.json && node --watch -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/api/dev.ts
scripts.devTasks: tsc -p dev.tsconfig.json && node --watch -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/tasks/dev.ts
scripts.devWebhooks: tsc -p dev.tsconfig.json && nodemon --exec "node --inspect -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register" src/webhooks/dev.ts
